title: 48 Hour Film Challenge
body:
I'm not dead... just buried in Team Moxie's 48 Hour Film Challenge. We have until 8:02 pm on Sunday to complete a 5 minute film. Wish us luck! I'll have more to report on Monday.

Also, there's a new spam detection tool on the comment form. Let me know if you have any problems with it. I don't want it to be intrusive, but I had to do something... I was getting well over 2,000 spam comments a day.
author: Dan

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Nice work Dan. Thanks to a previous post of yours, I even know what 'flipping someone off' means. Is there a random selection of questions?

Leave it to you to make even the Spam Filter entertaining.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Dan, I could have sworn your favorite drink was stagnant pond water...

Oh wait, now I remember - you like FALLING into stagnant pond water, not DRINKING it.
